title: Expand your resume in 2024 with $30 off lifetime IT training
content:
Macworld

If you need added incentive to jump into a better career this year (or enhance your existing one), you can start today with a lifetime membership to StackSkills Unlimited. Rated 4.6/5 on Trustpilot, this is a massive resource for anyone seeking to boost their resume, and it’s now down to $39.97 for a limited time.

You can find tutorials from more than 350 experienced and certified instructors on this platform, and new courses are added every month. Many of the more than 1,000 current courses serve as study guides for top IT certifications, and you’ll also find lessons in programming, finance, web design, photography, and more.

Don’t wait to start your subscription: This lifetime membership to StackSkills Unlimited is only available for $39.97 (reg. $600) through Jan. 28.
